method: Put all the ingredients into a clean jar with a secure lid. Shake well to emulsify the dressing and serve. If the dressing separates, just give it another shake. Add a crushed clove of garlic or 1 tbsp fresh herbs for variety.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp wine vinegar,  1 tsp French mustard,  pinch of caster sugar,  salt and pepper
